name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **Python**, MLOps, and cloud services, specifically with **AWS**. I am skilled in developing high-performance AI/ML solutions with frameworks like **LangChain**, **LangGraph**, and integrating with technologies such as **OpenAI** and **Anthropic**. My experience extends to utilizing tools like **CrewAI**, **Qdrant**, **Milvus**, **Pinecone**, and **pgvector** for scalable AI applications. 
In my previous roles, I have effectively developed enterprise-grade platforms within the healthcare and financial sectors, focusing on predictive analytics and real-time data processing, while ensuring compliance with industry standards. I have a solid foundation in constructs such as microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, combined with a deep understanding of observability practices. My dedication to developing secure and robust applications positions me to drive innovation and enhance system performance within your organization.
